section_title: 14f02 - Flight instructors - contracts for flight training.
text:
Flight instructors, who
qualify for exemption as teachers under FLSA 29 C.F.R. 541.303, are not
“service employees” for purposes of the SCA. (See FOH Chapter 22)
html: Flight instructors, who qualify for exemption as teachers under FLSA 29 C.F.R. 541.303, are not “service employees” for purposes of the SCA. (See FOH Chapter 22)
